An Attitude for Preparing for and Embracing New Innovations

Taking on the challenge of a new world is always lonely and arduous. No newness comes from sitting back and racking your brains. The seeds of innovation are the trivial results we grasp while braving the harsh winds of the field.

Innovation isn't something you prepare for in times of difficulty. True meaning comes only when you voluntarily relinquish vested interests and take on challenges during a period of rapid growth. Embracing innovation while holding onto what you already have is greed.

The world is at a critical turning point. Everything has come to a standstill, consumed by AI. Now is the time to design humanity's next 100 years.

Should we indulge in momentary comfort or redefine humanity's future? An innovative attitude begins with a clear mind. Only by boldly relinquishing our rights can we see the future.

Powerful nations and leading global companies seem preoccupied with securing their own share. Rather than this, we should demonstrate the visionary spirit of sharing, even in the smallest detail. The current world, with its outward show of force, quietly yearns for fresh innovation.

Now, the world is crying out loud! It's waiting for a reset.
